name: Sanitize.it
body:
### Welcome to Sanitize.it
We are in the process of making an easy-to-use and fun-looking layout for the Sanitize.it website which will allow you (the developer) to easily find simple techniques on how to secure your sites from common injection techniques that hackers use.  Please check back soon!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
